review: I tried fluconazole for couple times for the same condition, it worked temporarily but came back couple times, with itraconazole it went away! I'm so glad my dr prescribed it to me, I've been suffering for months!

I used to have reoccurring yeast infection but not any more. My doctor prescribed itraconazole 2 tabs (100mg) for 5 days . Then to take 2 tabs during my periods for 3 months.  I never get itchy down there anymore
My doc gave 1 tab daily for 7 days but itching is still there. Now I'm wondering whether it will clear out or not.

Sporanox (itraconazole):It worked wonders for me, I suffer from severe constipation which causes thrush from time to time & I would use the cream after a few days the infection will occur again my doctor put me on sporanox for seven days one tablet a day & it since has never returned once I completed my treatment that was over a year ago. This is the best yeast infection treatment I would be an advocate for it.

This medicine has so far worked very well. My Dr prescribed it after the usually infection pill and cream didn't work. I've been put on a five day dose, two capsules once a day and so far the itching has completely  subsided... I am much less uncomfortable than I was before I started the medicine.My Dr also prescribed two capsules on the first day of my cycle for three months to get rid of recurrence of the infection.It works wonders

Sporanox (itraconazole):I definitely recommend Sporanox because it worked well for me without side effects. My doc placed me on it for 7 days and then another 7 day repeat if symptoms persist; which it did. Upon completion of my 14 days (2 capsules once daily) I had no symptoms. It is now 2 going on 3 wks later and I haven't relapsed with any of the symptoms or anything indicating the yeast infection returning.

Sporanox (itraconazole):Just started the treatment with Sporanox (on the first day) after vaginal infection pill and fungal cream didn't work and had a lot of hypersensitive skin reaction. Now going without cream just antiseptic rinse and some lotion on affected area. I found it works wonder as the first day taking the pills. I shall report once again after completion of 7 days treatment.
Sporanox (itraconazole):This medication did wonders with this problem.
Sporanox (itraconazole):Sporonox works so much better than other medicines or vaginal creams.
